attributes.action: Protect Loch Lomond: Prevent any building of leisure resorts on Loch Lomond.
attributes.additional_details: Any sort of Leisure facility in the area of Balloch could be detrimental to the environment of Loch Lomond. Potential wildlife issues could surface such as excessive damage to natural habitats. A lot of road systems going in and out of the Trossachs area will have to be resurfaced and some may also needed to be replaced based on potential future traffic conditions. I hope something can be done to protect the scenery and current environmental standards from any negative effects.
attributes.background: With recent news of Flamingo Land owner being in talks to build a £30m leisure resort, it may bring environmental issues to the area of Balloch. Please help protect the area from any potential building projects and preserve the natural beauty of the Loch.

rejection.details: You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
